programme.title: The Numtums (S2)
programme.desc: Larry and Billy's Dance Game - The Numpups can't wait to win prizes on Larry and Billy's dance game but how will they remember which colours to jump on?(n)

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1)
programme.desc: Rain - A cloud appears in Teletubbyland and it rains. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po watch the flowers bloom. Another cloud appears and it rains pink, Tubby Custard!(n)

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1)
programme.desc: Apple - Dee encourages a friend to say apple and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.(n)

programme.title: Tinpo (S1)
programme.desc: Hats Off - It's early in the morning and Logi-Po has already lost his hat! The team retraces his steps to help him find it.(n)

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1)
programme.desc: It's time to look at old pictures - A photo of Gran Gran and JoJo's mummy when she was a little girl inspires them to take a walk and compare old photos of their neighbourhood to see how it has changed over time.(n)

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1)
programme.desc: Get It Wrong To Get It Right - Monty is sad when he messes up his paper plane creation, but Gran teaches him that a person can learn from their mistakes.(n)

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1)
programme.desc: Purple Zappa - Monty gets a new toy robot and wonders whether it is better to keep it shiny and clean in the box or to have fun playing with it.(n)

programme.title: Bluey (S1)
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals, helping them to learn all about life in far away places, earning their Pen Pal badges and making some new friends in the process!(n)

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: Bioluminescent Bay, Puerto Rico - Glitch's bath time puts the creatures of Puerto Rico's Bioluminescent Bay in bubble-trouble.(n)

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: The Gobi Desert, Mongolia - Glitch's giant drill causes a dino-disaster for the team's fossil hunt in the Gobi Desert.(n)

programme.title: Bluey (S1)
programme.desc: The Adventure - Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.(n)

programme.title: Bluey (S1)
programme.desc: Backpackers - Mum and Dad are going on an adventure wearing the kids as their cheeky backpacks! Seeing the sights and buying street food, backpacking is a blast - until they lose their passports.(n)

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures (S1)
programme.desc: T-Rex And Imprint - Andy Day journeys back 65 million years to the time of the Tyrannosaurus Rex and its existence in North America.(n)

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines (S1)
programme.desc: Sailing Machines - Catie tests out three amazing machines that all have sails: a tall ship, a racing catamaran and a land yacht.(n)

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3)
programme.desc: Swashpuppets - Gem is joined by some CBeebies friends for a special Pirate Party. Cook and Line use odd socks to create their own cast of Swashpuppets and put on a show for Captain Sinker.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Get Indoors Badge - A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up all the creatures they can find outside and pile into the clubhouse for an impromptu party.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Camouflage Badge - The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about how to blend into their surroundings, earning their Camouflage Badges in the process!(n)

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: Maasai Mara National Park, Kenya - The team roars into action as Glitch tries to take a selfie with a lion in the Maasai Mara.(n)

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: Cappadocia, Turkey - A game of hide and seek threatens to topple the fairy chimneys of Cappadocia in Turkey.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16)
programme.desc: Bust My Buffers! - When Gordon is involved in a collision at the docks, his bufferbeam falls off. Unable to work without his buffers, Gordon has no choice but to use a set of diesel buffers.(n)

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3)
programme.desc: Train Fudge - Sarah and Duck take an unexpected train trip whilst on their quest to buy some fudge.(n)

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3)
programme.desc: Sticker Swap - Sarah is keen to complete her sticker album, so sets off to see if her friends can help with her collection.(n)

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1)
programme.desc: The Train Runs Cold - Nelly and Nora try to figure out who made the tracks in the snow.(n)

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2)
programme.desc: Can You Maybe Turn The Light On? - Lola is not afraid of the dark, she just likes her door open, the blind up and the light on. Charlie helps her with her fear.(n)

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1)
programme.desc: The Things That Fell Up - Gwen finds a butterfly for her collection, but its colours fade when she takes it away from its friends.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2)
programme.desc: The Party Badge - Bing Bong - there's somebody at the door. It's delivery Chipmunk with a parcel for Duggee, but why is it wrapped up like a present? Maybe its Duggee's birthday!(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2)
programme.desc: The Tour Guide Badge - Gerbie the snake is on holiday and would like to see all the beautiful sights. Duggee can help, he does have his Tour Guide badge!(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2)
programme.desc: The Sailing Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are enjoying a day at the beach, when they encounter the Penguins who explain they were on a very important mission when they got sick.(n)

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3)
programme.desc: Ronda Reunion, Spain - Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.(n)

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3)
programme.desc: Mud Volcano, Azerbaijan - Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?(n)
